oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Adaptive implementation of polynomial expansion detector for multi-user detection in DS-CDMA systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DUA, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: access channels
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The polynomial expansion (PE) multi-user detector was proposed to eliminate the computational complexity of matrix inversion involved in the decorrelating detector and the MMSE detector. Computation of the polynomial coefficients in a PE detector is, however. a complex task. A fast converging adaptive algorithm based on the Davidon-Fletcher-Powell (DFP) method is proposed for computing polynomial weights for a PE detector,
